events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on May 9th involving their vehicle being hit at a stoplight.
Claim was assigned to the Auto Accident cluster based on keywords found in the initial report about the car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case to ensure thorough assistance.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
The agent requested additional documents including police report and photographs of the vehicle damage.
Customer submitted all the required documents promptly, including detailed photos and the official accident report.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has officially commenced by the claims department.
Investigation concluded with findings that confirm the other driver was at fault for the auto accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and associated damages from the accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim and the proposed settlement terms.
The claim was formally approved after the customer accepted the settlement offer, proceeding to payment.
Payment for vehicle repairs was issued to the customer promptly following claim approval for the accident.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment completion.
